Description: Marl pottery jar of squat globular shape, rounded base, everted ledge rim and two short tubular handles on shoulder. Exterior decorated in faded red paint with closely spaced spirals of various sizes over entire body with some undulating lines running between them. The rim is decorated with crosshatched lines.
Curator's comments: Like Decorated ware D67B in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
